scripts.say: Ayanami here. We were able to enter the Virtual Mirror Sea without issues.
It's similar to the Mirror Seas we've encountered before, but...
There are a lot of things I've never seen before! Is this one of those "virus" or "bug" things?
Huuh... I didn't see these in the patch notes. I guess it really must be a bug after all...
I have no idea what's happening, but let's all stay alert! Let's proceed carefully!
